random.line: (Hello, human. You have entered the lair of Velazquez the Great. What can I help you with?)
Um. Why are you called "the Great"?
(You ignorant girl! You have never heard of the Great Velazquez, the conqueror of both Cuba and Mexico?)
(Dios mio! I've led countless bird brethren across the oceans far and wide to conquer all the lands. World domination will soon be possible!)
(Greetings! You are speaking to Velazquez the Great. How may I help you?)
Um. Why are you hanging around here?
(I am fighting a great war against an empress. She has yet to surrender, even though all her army's fled.)
You mean the stable lady? Did you free her animals?
(Why, yes. I freed the captured slaves under her rule. If she'd only give me a piece of food as a token of peace, I will leave this place.)
(Greetings, mortal. I am Velazquez the Great.)
Um. So your name is Velazquez?
(Yes, I just told you that! But that's a shortening of my name. My real name is Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno de la Santísima Trinidad Martyr Patricio Clito Velazquez.
